intent_atoms.description: Document VoiceOver, Dynamic Type, and keyboard navigation guidelines tailored to ISOInspector’s SwiftUI tree, detail, and hex views so follow-on UI features stay aligned with the completed accessibility work.
Capture a written checklist covering VoiceOver labels, rotor navigation expectations, Dynamic Type behavior, and keyboard focus patterns for tree, detail, and hex surfaces.
Provide linkage to existing implementation touchpoints (e.g., accessibility identifiers, tests, and preview audits) plus gaps requiring follow-up bugs or research tasks.
Outline verification steps (Accessibility Inspector passes, XCTest coverage, manual QA scenarios) that future contributors must satisfy before shipping UI changes.
Non-functional requirement NFR-USAB-001 mandates VoiceOver and Dynamic Type support, and the product requirements emphasize keyboard navigation for all interactive components.
Existing NestedA11yIDs integration provides consistent identifiers, offering a baseline the guidelines should reference for automation and documentation touchpoints.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Label Checklist
functional_units.description: A written checklist ensuring all UI components have appropriate VoiceOver labels and rotor navigation expectations.

functional_units.name: Dynamic Type Behavior Checklist
functional_units.description: A written checklist verifying that UI elements adapt correctly to Dynamic Type settings across breakpoints.

functional_units.description: Guidelines for testing keyboard focus patterns and shortcuts on tree, detail, and hex surfaces.

functional_units.description: Linkage of existing accessibility identifiers (NestedA11yIDs) to implementation touchpoints for automation and documentation.

functional_units.name: Automated Test Integration
functional_units.description: Integration points for XCTest coverage and automated tests that validate accessibility compliance.

functional_units.description: Defined manual quality assurance scenarios using Accessibility Inspector and other tools.

functional_units.description: Documentation of macOS vs. iPadOS/iOS differences in keyboard shortcuts, focus scopes, and Dynamic Type breakpoints.
